There was one other sighting in Lakewood on or around January 9th 2013
Summary: Saw 3 colored lights moving in odd flight pattern,
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home at night, when i saw 3 colored lights fly almost straight up from a large park a few blocks away. i was watching them and they were flying in strange patterns around the area. I proceeded to park my car, and took a video of it with my cell phone. there was no noise from the aircraft. I turned off my camera and drove home, because i was a little frightened.
